title: We shout last night, We shout the night before, We will shout tomorrow night And we'll shout forever more So that’s the reason why, The faith will never die, For the young ones have to come Before the old ones die.
lyrics: We shout last night, We shout the night before, We will shout tomorrow night And we'll shout forever more So that’s the reason why, The faith will never die, For the young ones have to come Before the old ones die.
